item.title: AWS ETL Youtube Pipeline
item.description: Tech Stack ➔ Languages: SQL, Python ➔ AWS Services: S3, Glue, QuickSight, Lambda, Athena, IAM ➔ SDK: AWS Data Wrangler Introduction In this project, we’re simulating a client’s needs for a data-driven campaign through an AWS data pipline. Such a task could be useful for a client who plans to advertise on Youtube and wants to get better insight on what factors can help make a video more popular. SEE LEARNING GOALS Questions to answer:
